results.name: Hearthstone
results.notes:
- Before to install this script, you have to install "Battle.net - Standard" script installer
- You have battle.net installed and want an icon to launch directly "Hearthstone" from Lutris interface, this script is for you
results.content:
game:
  arch: win64
  args: --exec="launch WTCG"
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Battle.net/Battle.net.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: blizzard-battlenet-standard
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_SKIP_CLEANUP: 1
wine:
  battleye: false
  d3d_extras: true
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_nvapi: true
  eac: false
  esync: true
  fsr: false
  fsync: true
  version: lutris-GE-Proton8-5-x86_64
  vkd3d: true
